src:
Carolina Miranda de ‘Love On Top’ revela pormenores sobre a gravidez
05 Nov 2019, 23:15 by A Televisão

Tiago Ferreira e Carolina Miranda, ex-concorrentes do Love On Top, da TVI, revelaram recentemente nas redes sociais que vão ser pais pela primeira vez.

Esta segunda-feira, a jovem esteve a responder a perguntas dos fãs nas redes sociais, sobre esta nova fase da sua vida.
Questionada por uma fã, sobre como descobriu que estava grávida, a ex-concorrente explicou: “O período deixou de aparecer e já estava desconfiada. Fiz três testes para confirmar que era verdade e que não era nenhum erro do teste.”
RELACIONADAS


Carolina Miranda do 'Love On Top' está grávida


Carolina Carvalho revela pormenores emocionantes sobre drama familiar


Carolina Miranda e Tiago Ferreira acusados de mentir no caso das burlas


Margarida Menezes revela pormenores sobre a sua vida sexual


Já sobre o nome da criança, Carolina revelou que tem dois nomes. “Já decidiram o nome do vosso filho/a?”, perguntou uma fã.
“Martim/ Constança”, respondeu.
text:
Carolina Miranda from Love On Top reveals pregnancy details
05 Nov 2019, 23:15 by The Television

Tiago Ferreira and Carolina Miranda, former contestants of TVI's Love On Top, recently revealed on social networks that they will be parents for the first time.

This Monday, the young woman was answering questions from fans on social networks, about this new phase of her life.
Asked by a fan about how she found out she was pregnant, the former competitor explained: “The period stopped appearing and was already suspicious. I did three tests to confirm that it was true and that it was no test error. ”
RELATED


Carolina Miranda from 'Love On Top' is pregnant


Carolina Carvalho reveals exciting details about family drama


Carolina Miranda and Tiago Ferreira accused of lying in the case of scams


Margarida Menezes reveals details about her sex life


As for the child's name, Carolina revealed that she has two names. “Have you decided on your son's name?” Asked a fan.
“Martim / Constance,” he answered.
